books.title: Throne of Glass
books.author: Sarah J. Maas
books.description: An assassin that must prove herself in order to gain her freedom, Celaena Sardothien has become one of the most iconic heroines in a fantasy series.

books.title: Sun of Blood and Ruin
books.author: Mariely Lares
books.description: This reimagining of Zorro—featuring a heroic warrior sorceress—weaves Mesoamerican mythology and Mexican history two decades after the Spanish conquest into a swashbuckling, historical debut fantasy with magic, intrigue, treachery, and romance.

books.title: The Wheel of Time
books.author: Robert Jordan
books.description: The Eye of the World, the first novel in the epic fantasy series, The Wheel of Time, follows Moiraine Damodred as she arrives in Emond's Field on a quest to find the one prophesized to stand against The Dark One.

books.title: The Poppy War
books.author: R. F. Kuang
books.description: This captivating military fantasy, written with delicious precision, asks important questions about the collateral damage—both mental and physical—of wars and those who participate in them.

books.title: The Three-Body Problem
books.author: Cixin Liu
books.description: An alien invasion kicks off a riveting tale of unity and division that will make you reconsider what the fate of humanity really is.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: Frank Herbert addresses overarching themes of family politics, religion, environment and the all-encompassing temptation of power, all set against the backdrop of a futuristic civilization that, at times, can be unflinchingly prophetic

books.title: Parable of the Sower
books.author: Octavia Butler
books.description: Thought-provoking and brilliantly written, Parable of the Sower is a warning about what the future of Earth could look like if climate change is not taken seriously.

books.title: All Systems Red
books.author: Martha Wells
books.description: A tense science fiction adventure by Martha Wells that interrogates the roots of consciousness through Artificial Intelligence.

books.title: A Little Life
books.author: Hanya Yanagihara
books.description: A deeply profound, moving and emotional work that examines the intimate ties between families bound by choice rather than blood.

books.title: Circe
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.description: A lyrical, action-packed dive into the origin of an unforgettable and unparalleled woman, Circe cements herself in the pantheon of stories that must not be missed.

books.title: Bunny
books.author: Mona Awad
books.description: Through the fictional clique of the Bunnies, Awad offers a candid and barbed portrait of the nuances of femininity and societal expectations forced onto women. With dynamic characters and an ever-twisting plot, this is a masterpiece just waiting to be devoured.

books.title: Mexican Gothic
books.author: Silvia Moreno-Garcia
books.description: Something sinister is brewing beneath an isolated mansion in the Mexican countryside, and an ancient evil is about to be exposed.
